title: My Bible And L, My Bible And I
lyrics: I'm gonna sing, sing, sing, I'm gonna shout, shout, shout, I'm gonna sing, I'm gonna shout Praise the Lord, When the gates are open wide I will sit by Jesus' slde, I'm gonna sing, I'm gonna shout Praise the Lord, I'm gonna walk All around God's Heaven," And meet my loved ones Who's gone before, I'm gonna sit by the sides of the river, Until we meet to part no more.
